text:
Lloyd Cameron Russell-Moyle (born 14 September 1986) is a British politician. He is a member of Labour Co-operative. He has served as a Member of Parliament (MP) for Brighton Kemptown since the 2017 general election. He was also a councillor for Brighton and Hove City Council from 2016 to 2017.
Russell-Moyle was born in Brighton. He is openly gay. In November 2018, he revealed that he had been HIV-positive for a decade.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Russell-Moyle tested positive for COVID-19.
